statements: SELECT musician_name, total_streams FROM musician_statistics WHERE total_streams > 1000;
SELECT musician_name, total_downloads FROM musician_statistics WHERE total_downloads < 500;
SELECT musician_id, musician_name, total_streams FROM musician_statistics ORDER BY total_streams DESC;
SELECT musician_name, total_downloads, last_updated FROM musician_statistics WHERE musician_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM musician_statistics WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT musician_id, musician_name, total_streams, total_downloads, last_updated FROM musician_statistics WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT musician_name, total_streams, total_downloads FROM musician_statistics WHERE total_streams > 10000 ORDER BY total_streams DESC, last_updated ASC;
SELECT musician_name, total_streams, total_downloads FROM musician_statistics ORDER BY total_downloads DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT musician_id, SUM(total_streams) AS total_streams_all, SUM(total_downloads) AS total_downloads_all FROM musician_statistics GROUP BY musician_id;

SELECT musician_name, total_streams, total_downloads, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') AS last_updated_date FROM musician_statistics WHERE total_streams > total_downloads ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT name, genre FROM musicians WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, genre FROM musicians ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_stats WHERE stream_count > 1000;
SELECT musician_id, SUM(stream_count) AS total_streams FROM music_stats GROUP BY musician_id;
SELECT name, genre FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM musicians WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM music_stats WHERE stream_count > 10000 ORDER BY download_count DESC;
SELECT id, name, stream_count FROM musicians JOIN music_stats ON musicians.id = music_stats.musician_id WHERE stream_count < 5000;
SELECT name, stream_count FROM musicians JOIN music_stats ON musicians.id = music_stats.musician_id WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY stream_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT name, genre FROM musicians WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, artist_id FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_id, COUNT(*) as total_songs FROM songs GROUP BY artist_id;
SELECT song_id, stream_count, download_count FROM statistics ORDER BY stream_count DESC;
SELECT id, name, genre FROM musicians WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, release_date, genre FROM songs WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT m.name, s.title, s.release_date FROM musicians m JOIN songs s ON m.id = s.artist_id;
SELECT s.title, SUM(st.stream_count) AS total_streams FROM songs s JOIN statistics st ON s.id = st.song_id GROUP BY s.title;

SELECT m.name AS artist_name, s.title AS song_title, st.stream_count, st.download_count FROM musicians m JOIN songs s ON m.id = s.artist_id JOIN statistics st ON s.id = st.song_id WHERE m.genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM Musicians
SELECT musician_name, musician_genre FROM Musicians
SELECT song_id, song_title, release_date FROM Songs ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT song_title, streams_count FROM Songs JOIN StreamingStats ON Songs.song_id = StreamingStats.song_id
SELECT song_title, downloads_count FROM Songs JOIN DownloadStats ON Songs.song_id = DownloadStats.song_id
SELECT * FROM Musicians WHERE musician_genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY musician_name ASC
SELECT song_title, release_date FROM Songs WHERE musician_id = 1 ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT SUM(streams_count) AS total_streams, streaming_date FROM StreamingStats GROUP BY streaming_date

SELECT musician_name, song_title, streams_count FROM Musicians JOIN Songs ON Musicians.musician_id = Songs.musician_id JOIN StreamingStats ON Songs.song_id = StreamingStats.song_id WHERE streams_count > 1000 ORDER BY streams_count DESC

SELECT musician_name, download_date, downloads_count FROM Musicians JOIN Songs ON Musicians.musician_id = Songs.musician_id JOIN DownloadStats ON Songs.song_id = DownloadStats.song_id WHERE downloads_count > 500 ORDER BY download_date
SELECT * FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_name, genre FROM Musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT song_name, release_date FROM Songs WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Streams ORDER BY num_streams DESC;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM Albums WHERE musician_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_name, genre FROM Musicians WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM Musicians;
SELECT song_name, release_date FROM Songs ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT musician_name, COUNT(album_id) AS num_albums FROM Musicians JOIN Albums ON Musicians.musician_id = Albums.musician_id GROUP BY musician_name;
